String dictionary resource.

Azure REST API version: 2024-04-01. Prior API version in Azure Native 2.x: 2022-09-01.

Other available API versions: 2020-10-01, 2022-09-01.

These versions are not included in the SDK but you can generate them as a local SDK package; see the [version guide](../../../version-guide/#accessing-any-api-version-via-local-packages) for details.
## Import

An existing resource can be imported using its type token, name, and identifier, e.g.

```sh
$ pulumi import azure-native:web:WebAppConnectionStringsSlot myresource1 /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.Web/sites/{name}/slots/{slot}/config/connectionstrings 
```

### Constructor example

The following reference example uses placeholder values for all [input properties](#inputs).
<div>
<pulumi-chooser type="language" options="csharp,go,typescript,python,yaml,java"></pulumi-chooser>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="csharp">

```csharp
var webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource = new AzureNative.Web.WebAppConnectionStringsSlot("webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource", new()
{
    Name = "string",
    ResourceGroupName = "string",
    Slot = "string",
    Kind = "string",
    Properties = 
    {
        { "string", new AzureNative.Web.Inputs.ConnStringValueTypePairArgs
        {
            Type = AzureNative.Web.ConnectionStringType.MySql,
            Value = "string",
        } },
    },
});
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="go">

```go
example, err := web.NewWebAppConnectionStringsSlot(ctx, "webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource", &web.WebAppConnectionStringsSlotArgs{
	Name:              pulumi.String("string"),
	ResourceGroupName: pulumi.String("string"),
	Slot:              pulumi.String("string"),
	Kind:              pulumi.String("string"),
	Properties: web.ConnStringValueTypePairMap{
		"string": &web.ConnStringValueTypePairArgs{
			Type:  web.ConnectionStringTypeMySql,
			Value: pulumi.String("string"),
		},
	},
})
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="java">

```java
var webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource = new WebAppConnectionStringsSlot("webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource", WebAppConnectionStringsSlotArgs.builder()
    .name("string")
    .resourceGroupName("string")
    .slot("string")
    .kind("string")
    .properties(Map.of("string", Map.ofEntries(
        Map.entry("type", "MySql"),
        Map.entry("value", "string")
    )))
    .build());
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="python">

```python
web_app_connection_strings_slot_resource = azure_native.web.WebAppConnectionStringsSlot("webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource",
    name="string",
    resource_group_name="string",
    slot="string",
    kind="string",
    properties={
        "string": {
            "type": azure_native.web.ConnectionStringType.MY_SQL,
            "value": "string",
        },
    })
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="typescript">

```typescript
const webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource = new azure_native.web.WebAppConnectionStringsSlot("webAppConnectionStringsSlotResource", {
    name: "string",
    resourceGroupName: "string",
    slot: "string",
    kind: "string",
    properties: {
        string: {
            type: azure_native.web.ConnectionStringType.MySql,
            value: "string",
        },
    },
});
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>


<div>
<pulumi-choosable type="language" values="yaml">

```yaml
type: azure-native:web:WebAppConnectionStringsSlot
properties:
    kind: string
    name: string
    properties:
        string:
            type: MySql
            value: string
    resourceGroupName: string
    slot: string
```

</pulumi-choosable>
</div>

        <span id="slot_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#slot_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">slot</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Name of the deployment slot. If a slot is not specified, the API will update the connection settings for the production slot.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="kind_nodejs">
<a data-swiftype-name="resource-property" data-swiftype-type="text" href="#kind_nodejs" style="color: inherit; text-decoration: inherit;">kind</a>
</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">string</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Kind of resource.</dd><dt class="property-optional"
            title="Optional">
        <span id="properties_nodejs">

</span>
        <span class="property-indicator"></span>
        <span class="property-type">{[key: string]: Conn<wbr>String<wbr>Value<wbr>Type<wbr>Pair<wbr>Args}</span>
    </dt>
    <dd>Connection strings.</dd></dl>
</pulumi-choosable>
